dcterms:creator: Anh Nguyen
Dimitrios Kanoulas
Darwin G Caldwell
Nikos G Tsagarakis
dcterms:description: The IIT-AFF dataset consists of 8835 real-world images, composed of around 60% of the images from ImageNet dataset, with 10 object categories, 9 affordance classes, 14642 object bounding boxes, and 24677 affordance regions at pixel level.
dcterms:title: IIT-AFF Dataset

dcterms:creator: Austin Myers
Ching L Teo
Cornelia Fermüller
Yiannis Aloimonos
dcterms:description: The UMD dataset contains around 30k RGB-D images of daily kitchen, workshop, and garden objects, captured from a Kinect camera, with 7 affordance classes and 17 object categories.
dcterms:title: UMD Dataset

dcterms:creator: Jia Deng
Wei Dong
Richard Socher
Li-Jia Li
Kai Li
Li Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: ImageNet is a large-scale hierarchical image database used for various computer vision tasks.
dcterms:title: ImageNet Dataset

dcterms:creator: Mark Everingham
SM Ali Eslami
Luc Van Gool
Christopher KI Williams
John Winn

dcterms:description: Pascal VOC is a benchmark in visual object category recognition and detection, providing a standard dataset for evaluating object detection algorithms.
dcterms:title: Pascal VOC

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge Belongie
James Hays
Pietro Perona
Deva Ramanan
Piotr Dollár
C Lawrence Zitnick
dcterms:description: The COCO dataset is designed for object detection, segmentation, and captioning, featuring common objects in context.
dcterms:title: COCO Dataset
